name: souvenir
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 something you buy or keep to help you remember a holiday or special event: He bought a model of a red London bus as a souvenir of his trip to London. We brought back a few souvenirs from our holiday in Mexico. Synonyms
keepsake
memento

something you keep or give to remember a special visit or event: I’ll keep this as a souvenir of my trip to New York.
